Name: Mail
Desc: This section lets you configure how the mail shell works.

Keys.Name: Show mail message preview
Keys.Description: When listing mail messages, show body preview.

Keys.Name: Username prompt style for mail
Keys.Description: Write how you want your login prompt to be. Leave blank to use default style. Placeholders are parsed.

Keys.Name: Password prompt style for mail
Keys.Description: Write how you want your password prompt to be. Leave blank to use default style. Placeholders are parsed.

Keys.Name: IMAP prompt style for mail
Keys.Description: Write how you want your IMAP server prompt to be. Leave blank to use default style. Placeholders are parsed.

Keys.Name: SMTP prompt style for mail
Keys.Description: Write how you want your SMTP server prompt to be. Leave blank to use default style. Placeholders are parsed.

Keys.Name: Automatically detect mail server
Keys.Description: Automatically detect the mail server based on the given address.

Keys.Name: Notify for new mail messages
Keys.Description: Notifies you for any new mail messages.

Keys.Name: GPG password prompt style for mail
Keys.Description: Write how you want your GPG password prompt to be. Leave blank to use default style. Placeholders are parsed.

Keys.Name: Send IMAP ping interval
Keys.Description: How many milliseconds to send the IMAP ping?

Keys.Name: Send SMTP ping interval
Keys.Description: How many milliseconds to send the SMTP ping?

Keys.Name: Mail text format
Keys.Description: Controls how the mail text will be shown.

Keys.Name: Maximum number of e-mails in one page
Keys.Description: How many e-mail messages to display in one page?

Keys.Name: Show mail transfer progress
Keys.Description: If enabled, the mail shell will show how many bytes transmitted when downloading mail.

Keys.Name: Mail transfer progress
Keys.Description: Write how you want your mail transfer progress style to be. Leave blank to use default style. Placeholders are parsed. {0} for transferred size and {1} for total size.

Keys.Name: Mail transfer progress (single)
Keys.Description: Write how you want your mail transfer progress style to be. Leave blank to use default style. Placeholders are parsed. {0} for transferred size.
